mean_cn: n.沙文主义者，盲目爱国主义
mean_en: an attitude  that the members of your own sex are always better than those of the opposite sex
sentence: She felt dissatisfied in the relationship because of her husband\u0027s embedded male chauvinism.
sentence_trans: 她对这段感情很不满，因为她丈夫的男性沙文主义很严重。
word_etyma: chauvin沙文 + ism名词后缀 → chauvinism 沙文主义
